By using android:entries, you can provide a fixed set of options directly in the XML file without the need for a separate adapter or code to populate the dropdown items.
Note that if you need more complex customization or dynamic data for the dropdown options, it's recommended to use a custom adapter and populate the data programmatically. However, if you have a small, static set of options, hard coding them in the XML file can be a convenient approach.
